channel.title: Dragon Claws Spec
channel.description: My dragon claws spec is not hitting really high or often like i want it to. Which file would i edit to change the hit ratio of it?

item.title: Dragon Claws Spec
item.dc:creator: @NotLikingThis NotLikingThis
item.description:
@NotLikingThis wrote:

[quote=“Exstasy, post:4, topic:419406”]It’s not in items.java it’s client sided i believe and you have to search for the case # for the claws spec -i don’t remember which file don’t hate me-
Then it will say something like specamounttaken=5.0
Then under that is should say something about power it will probably be =0 since you just hit a bunch of zeros
I would change it to like 3.5 so it doesn’t hit too much. 9.0 is the most powerful it can get so ^.^[/quote]
Thanks but it wasn’t client sided it was server sided and it was in CombatAssistant.java and the spec damage was at 0.80 so i put that up.

Read full topic

item.title: Dragon Claws Spec
item.dc:creator: @Exstasy Exstasy
item.description:
@Exstasy wrote:

It’s not in items.java it’s client sided i believe and you have to search for the case # for the claws spec -i don’t remember which file don’t hate me-
Then it will say something like specamounttaken=5.0
Then under that is should say something about power it will probably be =0 since you just hit a bunch of zeros
I would change it to like 3.5 so it doesn’t hit too much. 9.0 is the most powerful it can get so ^.^

Read full topic

item.title: Dragon Claws Spec
item.dc:creator: @Roar337 Roar337
item.description:
@Roar337 wrote:

hmm dosent really sound like much fun just edit the dclaws stats in item config or if your stubboron like me go to the void where it checks for full void melee and adds the void melee effect on my server it gives a bonus to attack *= 1.35? i dont know but anyways add somthing like void melee for dclaws that should make it hit more often
